synopsis.text: Onoda Makoto and Yura, a newly-wed couple at the age of 25, share a deep love for each other despite their marriage being arranged. However, their romantic journey takes an awkward turn as they navigate the uncharted waters of intimacy, with neither having any prior sexual experience. To spice up their love life, they seek guidance from friends, family, and even adult media, leading to a series of comedic and daring encounters. As they fumble through the complexities of marriage and sex, their bond only grows stronger, making their clumsy attempts all the more endearing. Will they finally master the art of love, or will their innocent blunders continue to add humor to their marital life? Join this lovable couple as they embark on a journey of self-discovery and passion.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
